ygData.subject: RE: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: Frake said: And yet, oddly enough, my PII-350 with a voodoo 3 handles 45 people plus corpses in BB no problem. I ve yet to be convinced corpses add any
ygData.messageBody:
Frake said:

"And yet, oddly enough, my PII-350 with a voodoo 3 handles 45 people
plus corpses in BB no problem.

I've yet to be convinced corpses add any noticeable lag.

How do you gauge FPS in the teens, buy the way; do you have some way
of actually measuring this?"



I respond:

"nope, i just "eyeball" it. having played quake and quake II, you just
get a feel for when your framerates go below 25. :) What rez are you
running at, anyway? I'm running in 1024x768, with all the goodies turned
on to the max.

Saidinn Witchwood

P.S. This may go further in proving that even a 450Mhz K6-III can't do
what a PII does in it's sleep :)
